description.oldValue:
You will now be able to start a Teams Chat with Distribution Groups, Mail-enabled Security Groups, and O365 Groups. This feature will respect the limits on members in a group chat, currently set to 250 members.
GA date: December CY2022
description.newValue:
You will now be able to start a Teams Chat with Distribution
Groups, Mail-enabled Security Groups, and O365 Groups. This feature will
respect the limits on members in a group chat, currently set to 250 members.
